entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You've bested all foes in Nym's Stronghold Arena.
entries.journal_entry_description: Beat all opponents in Nym's Stronghold Arena
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find the roof of Nym's Stronghold and you will find the arena.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Speak with the referee when you are ready for your first opponent.
entries.task01_utterance_wave_1: If I kill you, I get to live. You die now!
entries.task02_comm_message_text: You surprise me, fringer. Continue like this and you'll be a Lok Revenant in no time. Speak to the referee to start the next fight.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Speak to the referee when you are ready for your second opponent.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: Not too bad. When you're ready, speak to the referee to start your next fight.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Speak to the referee when you are ready for your next opponent.
entries.task06_comm_message_text: And another foe has fallen! You are the newest arena hero, congratulations! Speak to the referee to start the next fight.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Speak to the referee when you are ready for your next opponent.
entries.task08_comm_message_text: Great job! You've got one more fight left. Speak to the referee when ready.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Speak to the referee when you are ready for your next opponent.
entries.task10_comm_message_text: You did it! You just made me a much richer pirate. Ha ha!
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Speak with Nym in the Stronghold.
